contagion.name: Contagion
contagion.description: Spreads terrible disease on the target creature, dealing 1 poison damage per 2 turns 3 times. Every damage tick spreads the contagion in a small area around victim.

silence.name: Terror
silence.description: Renders all creatures in a huge area silenced, preventing them from casting spells for 5 turns
